https://www.youtube.com/c/CoComelon?sub_confirmation=1

playlist_videos.description:

https://www.youtube.com/c/CoComelon?sub_confirmation=1

Lyrics:
Jolly old Saint Nicholas
Lean your ear this way;
Don't you tell a single soul
What I'm going to say,
Christmas Eve is coming soon;
Now you dear old man,
Whisper what you'll bring to me;
Tell me if you can.

Ho Ho Ho!

When the clock is striking twelve,
When I'm fast asleep,
Down the chimney broad and black
With your pack you'll creep;
All the stockings you will find
Hanging in a row;
Mine will be the shortest one;
You'll be sure to know.

Ho Ho Ho!

Mom and dad want grown up things
YoYo wants a dolly
TomTom wants a story book,
Christmas sure is jolly
As for me, it‚Äôs getting late
This ole Christmas night
Choose for me, dear Santa Claus,
What you think is right.

Jolly old Saint Nicholas
Lean your ear this way;
Don't you tell a single soul
What I'm going to say,
Christmas Day is here at last
And it‚Äôs time to see
What you brought to me last night
Underneath our tree

Ho Ho Ho!

Sung (Mom):  Mama called the doctor and the doctor said‚Ä¶

Spoken (YoYo):  Oh no!
Sung (Mom): Mama called the doctor and the doctor said‚Ä¶
Spoken (Mom):  Hello?
Sung (JJ): No more animals jumping on the bed!

Sung (Mom): Mama called the doctor and the doctor said‚Ä¶
Spoken (Mom):  Hello?

They fell asleep while laying their heads

The doctor called Mama and Mama said‚Ä¶
Hello?

SHH!

No more animals jumping on the bed.

Yay!!!

In my magic art box

Let‚Äôs use my magic art box

Show us what to do

Ready for the next step?
Time to move along
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

It‚Äôs time for the next step!
Let‚Äôs craft and sing this song
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time
It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time!

Instructions
To make a paper airplane we need:
A sheet of paper
Crayons
And that‚Äôs it! Are you ready?

Step 1. First, take your sheet of paper
Now find the SHORTER sides
Take one SHORT side, match it with the other
With one hand, HOLD the top
And with the other hand, make the fold

Step 2. Unfold your paper. Now find the LONG side
Is this the LONG side?
Take one CORNER and drag it to the MIDDLE fold
With one hand, HOLD the corner down
The other hand can make the fold
Now take the other CORNER
 Then drag it to the MIDDLE fold
With one hand, HOLD the corner down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 3. See how it looks like a house?
Now fold it in half
 With the FLAPS on the OUTSIDE
Lay it on it‚Äôs side
Look! This is the MIDDLE POINT
Drag it down to match the BOTTOM fold
Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 4. Now flip the whole thing over!
And we‚Äôll do the same thing on the other side
Find that MIDDLE POINT again
This one!
Then drag it down to match the bottom fold
Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 5. Almost done!
Now let‚Äôs decorate our airplanes
And color it with our favorite things
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

Step 6. Your airplane is ready!
Thanks for crafting with us!
See you again on Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time!

Lean your ear this way;

What I'm going to say,
Christmas Day is here at last
And it‚Äôs time to see
What you brought to me last night
Underneath our tree

Ho Ho Ho!

playlist_details.title: CoComelon - MyGo! Sign Language for Kids
playlist_details.description:
We believe all kids should have access to good quality entertainment - regardless of geography, culture, background or abilities. This is why we are making our hugely popular kids show 'CoComelon' available to all kids in ASL.

At CoComelon, our primary goal has always been to engage families with entertaining and educational content that makes universally-relatable preschool moments fun. 

Our beautiful 3D animation and toe-tapping songs create a world that centers on the everyday experiences of young children. 

In addition to helping preschoolers learn letters, numbers, animal sounds, colors, and more, 
the videos impart prosocial life lessons, providing parents with an opportunity to teach and play with their children as they watch together.

playlist_videos.description:

It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time

In my magic art box
Are things that we can use!
Let‚Äôs use my magic art box
For making something new!

Show us what to do
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

Ready for the next step?
Time to move along
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

It‚Äôs time for the next step!
Let‚Äôs craft and sing this song
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time
It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time!

Instructions
To make a paper airplane we need:
A sheet of paper
Crayons
And that‚Äôs it! Are you ready?

Step 1. First, take your sheet of paper
Now find the SHORTER sides
Take one SHORT side, match it with the other
With one hand, HOLD the top
And with the other hand, make the fold

Step 2. Unfold your paper. Now find the LONG side
Is this the LONG side?
Take one CORNER and drag it to the MIDDLE fold
With one hand, HOLD the corner down
The other hand can make the fold
Now take the other CORNER
 Then drag it to the MIDDLE fold
With one hand, HOLD the corner down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 3. See how it looks like a house?
Now fold it in half
 With the FLAPS on the OUTSIDE
Lay it on it‚Äôs side
Look! This is the MIDDLE POINT
Drag it down to match the BOTTOM fold
Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 4. Now flip the whole thing over!
And we‚Äôll do the same thing on the other side
Find that MIDDLE POINT again
This one!
Then drag it down to match the bottom fold
Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 5. Almost done!
Now let‚Äôs decorate our airplanes
And color it with our favorite things
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

Step 6. Your airplane is ready!
Thanks for crafting with us!
See you again on Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time!

Watching good quality kids' shows can be a great support in a child's development. It is a way to explore emotions in a safe space, learn about relating to other people and about basic concepts such as vocabulary and counting.

We believe all kids should have access to good quality entertainment - regardless of geography, culture, background or abilities. This is why we are making our hugely popular kids show 'CoComelon' available to all kids in ASL.

Having a common cultural frame of reference is incredibly important for kids. And we are acutely aware that there is not currently the same abundance of content and choice available to kids who are deaf and hard-of-hearing, which other kids have. Which is why we are now signing our new content so that every kid, regardless of their abilities, can also enjoy and learn with CoComelon.

It‚Äôs Yoyo‚Äôs Arts and Crafts Time!

Instructions
To make a paper airplane we need:
A sheet of paper
Crayons

Step 1. First, take your sheet of paper

Step 2. Unfold your paper. Now find the LONG side

Take one CORNER and drag it to the MIDDLE fold

The other hand can make the fold

 Then drag it to the MIDDLE fold

Step 3. See how it looks like a house?

 With the FLAPS on the OUTSIDE

Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 4. Now flip the whole thing over!
And we‚Äôll do the same thing on the other side
Find that MIDDLE POINT again
This one!
Then drag it down to match the bottom fold
Use one hand to hold the point down
And with the other hand, make the fold!

Step 5. Almost done!
Now let‚Äôs decorate our airplanes
And color it with our favorite things
Coco-you coco-me coco-1, 2, 3!

Step 6. Your airplane is ready!
Thanks for crafting with us!

It‚Äôs My Go, it‚Äôs Your Go! Ready? Let‚Äôs Go!
Let‚Äôs learn American Sign Language with the MyGos!

Let‚Äôs Go - MyGo! is a new kids show from the creators of CoComelon for preschoolers, 2-5 years old. It‚Äôs a fun, music-filled show that normalizes and teaches kids American Sign Language (ASL). 

Watching good quality kids' shows can be a great support in a child's development. It is a way to explore emotions in a safe space, learn about relating to other people and about basic concepts such as vocabulary and counting.

We believe all kids should have access to good quality entertainment - regardless of geography, culture, background or abilities. This is why we are making our hugely popular kids show 'Blippi' available to all kids in ASL.

Having a common cultural frame of reference is incredibly important for kids. And we are acutely aware that there is not currently the same abundance of content and choice available to kids who are deaf and hard-of-hearing, which other kids have. Which is why we are now signing our new content so that every kid, regardless of their abilities, can also enjoy and learn with Blippi.

It‚Äôs My Go, it‚Äôs Your Go! Ready? Let‚Äôs Go!
Let‚Äôs learn American Sign Language with the MyGos!

Let‚Äôs Go - MyGo! is a new kids show from the creators of CoComelon for preschoolers, 2-5 years old. It‚Äôs a fun, music-filled show that normalizes and teaches kids American Sign Language (ASL). 

Watching good quality kids' shows can be a great support in a child's development. It is a way to explore emotions in a safe space, learn about relating to other people and about basic concepts such as vocabulary and counting.

We believe all kids should have access to good quality entertainment - regardless of geography, culture, background or abilities. This is why we are making our hugely popular kids show 'CoComelon' available to all kids in ASL.

Having a common cultural frame of reference is incredibly important for kids. And we are acutely aware that there is not currently the same abundance of content and choice available to kids who are deaf and hard-of-hearing, which other kids have. Which is why we are now signing our new content so that every kid, regardless of their abilities, can also enjoy and learn with CoComelon.

#CoComelon #ASL #SignLanguage #MyGo!

The Next baby bird then gave a sigh
Mama bird said now fly fly fly
But the baby bird said too high high high 

The 3rd baby bird at last went out
The Next baby bird then gave a pout
Mama bird said now fly fly fly
But the baby bird said oh why why why 

The 4th baby bird went down to eat 
The Last baby bird gave a long loud tweet
Mama bird said now fly fly fly
But the baby bird wanted to cry cry cry 

Mama bird said it‚Äôll be okay, 
you‚Äôll be alright and there‚Äôs a way  
The Little baby bird then started to sing 
And flew off flapping his wings 

All the baby birds with mother in the lead
Flew through the sky quite well indeed
Mama bird said now fly fly fly
And all the birds flew to the sky sky sky

snippet.title: CoComelon - Cody Time
snippet.description:
Join Cody Green - the little kid with a big imagination and an even bigger heart - in this spinoff series set in the familiar, beloved community of CoComelon!

snippet.title: CoComelon Bahasa Indonesia - Lagu Anak Anak
snippet.description:
Di CoComelon, JJ dan saudara-saudaranya melakukan petualangan yang menyenangkan ‚Äì baik dengan mengunjungi kamar anak-anak atau tinggal di rumah, selalu ada sesuatu yang baru yang dapat dipelajari atau dijelajahi, dan yang memberikan inspirasi tiada akhir dalam memanfaatkan waktu bermain dengan teman dan keluarga.

Selain membantu anak-anak prasekolah belajar huruf, angka, suara binatang, warna, dan banyak lagi,
video ini memberikan pelajaran sosial utama, membuat orang tua memiliki kesempatan untuk mengajar dan bermain dengan anak-anak mereka saat mereka menonton bersama.

IKUTI @moonbugentertainment di IG dan @MoonbugEntertainment di FB untuk update!

Facebook ‚ñ∫ https://www.facebook.com/CoComelonKids

TikTok ‚ñ∫ https://www.tiktok.com/@cocomelon
US Shop ‚ñ∫ https://shop.moonbug.com/collections/cocomelon

snippet.title: CoComelon Nederlands - Kinderliedjes
snippet.description:
In CoComelon beleven JJ en zijn broers en zussen leuke, herkenbare avonturen. Of ze nu naar de kleuterschool gaan of thuis blijven, er is altijd wel iets nieuws te leren of te verkennen en er is eindeloze inspiratie om alles uit de tijd met je vrienden en je gezin te halen.

De video's helpen kleuters met het leren van letters, cijfers, dierengeluiden, kleuren en meer. Daarnaast helpen ze met belangrijke sociale lessen en geven ze ouders de kans om samen met hun kinderen te spelen en te leren.

snippet.title: Little Baby Bum - Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs
snippet.description:
Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

Little Baby Bum is an animated musical show that celebrates early childhood experiences and supports cognitive development through loveable characters, relatable stories and the magic of song, repetition, rhythm, and rhyme.
